titleStmt.title: The printer's advertisement Whereas there is prefixed unto a late pamphlet, entituled, Gospel order revived, printed at New York, an advertisement, ...
titleStmt.author: Green, Bartholomew, 1667-1732.
Allen, John, 1660?-1727? aut
Mico, John. aut
Tuthill, Zechariah. aut
Brattle, Thomas, 1658-1713. aut

notesStmt.note: Signed at foot of p. 1: Boston, December 21st. 1700 Bartholomew Green.
The endorsement, p. 2, is dated: Boston, December 24th. 1700. Ascribed to Cotton Mather by Holmes.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
